events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to return it because the product does not meet my expectations and I would like a refund.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the customer's desire to return the product and receive money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to return your product and get a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund as quickly as possible?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product did not match the description, and I am not satisfied with the quality.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process, and you will receive a full refund once we receive the returned item. I will send you the return label shortly.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I appreciate you sending the return label, looking forward to getting this resolved.
The refund case has been resolved by sending the return label and initiating the refund process upon receipt of the item.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund on your account. Please let us know if there is anything else we can help you with.
Since your refund has been processed and the issue resolved, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey regarding your recent customer service experience. Your feedback helps us improve.
